message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. Would you be willing to meet me at $9000?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $10500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $9500?
I'm not willing to go as low as $9500, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to think about my own costs. How about we meet at $10250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $9800?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, which is my minimum price. If you're serious about the product, this is the best I can do.
I'm really interested in the product, but $10000 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $9800?
I'm not willing to go back to $9800, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $9900, which is my absolute minimum. If you're not serious about the product at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
